# isLoaded

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether column 0 is loaded.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isLoaded: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], column 0 is loaded.

## Managing Columns

- **addColumn()**: Adds a column to the right of the last column.
- **selectedColumn**: The index of the last column with a selected item.
- **lastColumn**: The index of the last column loaded.
- **firstVisibleColumn**: The index of the first visible column.
- **numberOfVisibleColumns**: The number of visible columns.
- **lastVisibleColumn**: The index of the last visible column.
- **validateVisibleColumns()**: Validates the browser’s visible columns.
- **loadColumnZero()**: Loads column 0; unloads previously loaded columns.
- **reloadColumn(_:)**: Reloads the given column.
